name: Space Cat (itch) (Wubbl)
description:
A puzzle-escape-jump'n'run-exploration-everything-else-you-can-think-of-platformer game. It's fun. Trust us. Play it. Now!

This is a short game we made for the 47th Ludum Dare Game Jam. It is the second jam we joined and the second game we ever made.
We, the team, are Wubbl, LadyMeow, Upsitesdown, Fraxxinus and Grundplatte. We had lot's of fun planning and making this game, and we hope you like playing it too!
